thread.title: Breakfast Now Permanent at ‘Be Our Guest Restaurant’
thread.title_full: Breakfast Now Permanent at ‘Be Our Guest Restaurant’

author: Off to Neverland Travel
title: Breakfast Now Permanent at ‘Be Our Guest Restaurant’
text:
Request a Quote Breakfast Now Permanent at ‘Be Our Guest Restaurant’ 
Magic Kingdom® Park has announced that the prix fixe breakfast that they started offering last March at Be Our Guest Restaurant in New Fantasyland™ is now permanent. This fast casual breakfast is served daily from 8a-10a. 
Meals are a quick service entitlement on the Disney Dining Plans or for those paying cash – $21.99 + tax for adults, $13.99 + tax for children ages 3-9 years. Advance Dining Reservations are accepted and recommended. Like at lunch and dinner, the breakfast menu options all have a French touch to them as well. Meals will include an entree, a pastry basket for sharing and selection of self-service beverages. Menu options include: Assorted Cured Meats and Cheeses Assorted Breakfast Sandwiches
